name: The Blind Seeker
description:
The Blind Seeker is a virtual Covid-19 friendly game played on Discord!

*This game can also be seen as a virtual hide and seek*

Roles: The Blind Seeker, The Enlightened, and The Hunted.

DESC: The goal of this game is for the seeker to catch the hunted. The game will end when the seeker hunted all but one the the hiders. The hiders will have access to special voice channels, which the seeker cannot see, to hide and taunt in! If the seeker says the voice channel number a hider is in, that hider is OUT!
